title: Why do most of the new champions or reworked champions riot makes have no weaknesses?
body:
Being squishy isn't a weakness if you cant be caught and cc doesn't exist as a weakness. Everyone dies if you get chained it will never count as a weakness if it cannot be exploited 1v1.



Ekko easy wave clear, low mana costs, escape, built in fight reset with targetable aoe nuke, slow, stun, shield, low cds, huge aoe poke that cannot be blocked by minions, huge built in damage boost with free speed up escape. 

pyke built in regen stealth pull aoe stun resetable aoe execute super fast low mana costs but decent cdshowever he has too many strengths for that one thing to offshoot.

Riot keeps putting things out that are just obviously broken as a design without anything or enough things to compensate.
